Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $175. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also the opportunity to secure it at a competitive advantage. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $175. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $175
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
